remarks: Change second bound variable in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using explicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2013.)
statement:
cbvopab2.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
cbvopab2.2 $e |- F/ y ps $.
cbvopab2.3 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvopab2 $p |- { <. x , y >. | ph } = { <. x , z >. | ps } $.
$d x y z $.
